title: cancelenterdoorroom2

title: JackIntro
body:
Welcome to the neighborhood, I trust the trips been eventful.
Home Sweet Home! Don't you think? 
You've made it this far, you might just make it home yet.
Besides, we all go home in the end.
During your visit, I'll be here, 
and there, 
and oh just about everywhere.
Just think of me as your friendly neighborhood watch.
[[ Almost to the end...| Jackintrodone ]] [[ Literary Suburban Hell, great.| Jackintrodone]]

title: HallwayHelpOptions
body: <<startdryadhelp>>

title: dryadchat3
body:
I know you didn't ask for advice, but you'd better put on some more clothes...
Wouldn't want men to get the wrong impression and hurt you...
[[I'll get right on that|dryadchatend]] [[I'll be careful|dryadchatend]]

title: HallwayReminder
body:
I am a Dryad...
Can't you tell I'm a woman by my girlish figure? 
Ents are much scarier than Dryads...
Thank Gaia for sexual dimorphism!
[[Hmmmm|dryadend]] [[Okay...|dryadend]]

title: Jackintrodone
body:
<<Jackintrodone>>
<<endtext>>

title: leave
body:
Until next time...
If you survive until next time that is...
[[That's cheerful|leaveend]] [[I'm trying|leaveend]]

title: dryadchat
body:
You'd be surprised how at old I am.
I know older women are only supposed to be wise if we look our age.
I'm very wise though even if my bark is flawless.
[[It does look lovely|dryadchatend]] [[Hmmmm|dryadchatend]]

title: dryadinteract
body:
What do you want?
[[I need help|HallwayHelpOptions]] [[I just want to chat|HallwayChat]] [[Who are you?|HallwayReminder]] [[Goodbye|leave]]

title: dryadchat2
body:
Shutting up and letting men take of boring jobs like rule-making makes things so much easier don't you think?
This way I can focus on my barkcare routine...
[[I suppose...|dryadchatend ]] [[Are you serious right now?|dryadchatend]]

title: dryadchat1
body:
I thought I saw a vampire going through one of those doors a bit ago...
You must tell me if you find one!
Vampires are so dreamy...
[[I don't think vampires are real|dryadchatend]] [[They definitely are!|dryadchatend]] [[ Maybe if it was Brad Pitt...|dryadchatend ]]

title: HallwayChat
body: <<startdryadchat>>

title: dryadhelp
body:
Maybe you should try going through one of those doors...
Watch out for other trees though!
They aren't all nice and beautiful like me...
[[I'll try|dryadhelpend]] [[Hmmmm|dryadhelpend]]

title: dryadhelp4
body:
Level2help
[[option1|dryadhelpend]] [[option2|dryadhelpend]]

title: dryadhelp3
body:
Level2 help
[[Option1|dryadhelpend]] [[Option2|dryadhelpend]]

title: dryadyhelp2
body:
Watch out for women who dress in skimpy clothing.
They always attract danger...
[[Wow...slut shame much?|dryadhelpend]] [[I'll get right on that...|dryadhelpend]]

title: dryadhelp1
body:
Be wary of pregnant women...
Have you ever seen one of them angry?
*shudder*
I'm so glad trees don't get pregnant like humans...
[[That is lucky!|dryadhelpend]] [[What?! Pregnancy is beautiful!|dryadhelpend]]

title: dryadchat4
body:
Go away, I'm primping my leaves for a date with this fearsome ENT!
[[Good luck!|dryadchatend]] [[Hmmmm|dryadchatend]]

title: dryadhelpend
body: <<enddryadhelp>> <<endtext>>

title: dryadchatend
body: <<enddryadchat>> <<endtext>>

title: dryadend
body: <<endtext>>

title: leaveend
body: <<endtext>>
